home.title: Your journey starts here!
home.description1: Each village around Lake Atitl√°n holds its own special charm, from colorful traditions to unique handicrafts, inviting you to discover the rich cultural diversity of Guatemala.
home.description2: Travel comfortably and safely in our shuttles while exploring Guatemala's cultural and natural diversity.
home.description3: Embark on an unforgettable adventure and explore the most beautiful corners of Lake Atitl√°n with our boat tours. Enjoy panoramic views of the volcanoes, visit picturesque villages, and immerse yourself in Mayan culture.
home.description4: Discover the most popular destinations with our convenient scheduled transfers. Travel comfortably and safely, without worrying about a thing.
home.description5: Explore hidden trails and enjoy breathtaking landscapes on our guided hiking tours. Our expert guides will take you along safe routes and provide all the necessary information for a unique experience.
home.header1: We are your best choice to explore Guatemala
home.subtitle2: Discover the soul of Guatemala with us. Are you ready to live an unforgettable experience? From majestic mountains to paradise beaches, Guatemala welcomes you with open arms. Our agency in Panajachel offers a wide variety of tours and packages so you can explore this beautiful country at your own pace. Can you imagine sailing on the crystal-clear waters of Lake Atitl√°n, exploring ancient Mayan ruins, or just relaxing on a white sand beach? With us, every trip is a unique adventure. Book now and start creating unforgettable memories!
home.subtitle3: Your safety is our priority. At Milan Tours, we are committed to providing you with a calm and safe journey. We have local expert guides who know every destination perfectly, as well as secure and reliable vehicles. Relax and enjoy your adventure, knowing that we are taking care of you.

about.title: About Us
about.description: We are a company committed to providing the best transportation service, ensuring comfort, safety, and punctuality on every trip.
about.subtitle: About Milan
about.descriptionPlatform: At Milan Tours, our mission is to offer unforgettable experiences to every traveler who wishes to discover the magic of Guatemala. Located in the heart of Panajachel, on the shores of the majestic Lake Atitl√°n, we specialize in providing transportation services, personalized tours, and adventure activities that combine safety, comfort, and cultural authenticity.
about.extraInfoPlatform: Our passion is connecting people with the essence of Guatemala, offering safe, exciting, and unforgettable travel experiences.
about.descriptionHistory: Since our beginnings in Guatemala, we have passionately worked to design unique experiences that allow travelers to discover the country's essence, its natural wealth, and the warmth of its people. Today, Milan Tours is synonymous with trust and quality in the tourism industry.
about.extraInfoHistory: Our commitment goes beyond offering tours; we want every trip to be an authentic adventure filled with unforgettable moments. We strive to provide exceptional service, ensuring that every detail makes your experience special.
about.coreValuesDescription: At Milan Tours, our essence is based on providing authentic experiences that connect people with the beauty and cultural richness of Guatemala. Our mission is to be the bridge between travelers and the wonders of our country, ensuring every detail so that their adventures are unforgettable, safe, and comfortable. We believe in sustainable tourism that respects and enriches both our visitors and local communities.
about.value1Description: We are driven by pride in our country. Every experience we offer is designed to highlight the culture, nature, and traditions that make Guatemala unique.
about.value2Description: The peace of mind of our clients is our priority. We strive to offer safe, reliable, and professional services at every stage of the journey.
about.value3Description: We promote genuine experiences that connect travelers with the essence of Guatemala. From cultural tours to adventure activities, every detail reflects authenticity and respect for local communities.

contact.title: Connect with Milan Tours!
contact.subtitle: Get in touch with us and discover how we can make your trip an unforgettable experience.

services.title: Our Services
services.subtitle: Discover the magic of Guatemala with Milan Tours. Located in the heart of Panajachel, we invite you to experience a unique and personalized adventure. Our team of local experts will help you create the perfect itinerary to explore the natural and cultural wonders of this beautiful country at your own pace.
services.subtitle1: Get the best exchange rate! Exchange your dollars and euros for quetzales and maximize your budget.
services.subtitle2: Travel worry-free! We take you to any corner of Guatemala with comfort and punctuality.
services.subtitle3: Exclusivity and comfort in every trip. Enjoy a private and personalized transfer.
services.subtitle4: Travel through the villages of Lake Atitl√°n on our shared boats and discover their charm.
services.subtitle5: Adventure on the lake! Enjoy water activities like canopy, paragliding, and hiking.

services.subtitle7: Experience a unique adventure in the Mayan jungle. Explore ancient ruins and the rich biodiversity of Tikal.

services.subtitle12: Explore the surroundings by bike. Rent one and discover new paths.

serviceD.description1: Exchange your money quickly and safely. We offer the best market rates.
serviceD.d1: Exchange your dollars and euros for quetzales at the best rates. Enjoy a fast and reliable service for your currency exchange needs.

esp1.d1: It is important to mention that in order to exchange money, it must be in acceptable condition.

serviceD.description2: Your journey starts here! Enjoy the convenience of being picked up and dropped off at your hotel, airport, or any destination. Our professional drivers ensure a safe and punctual trip tailored to your needs.
serviceD.d2: Our door-to-door transfer service provides comfortable and safe transportation between popular destinations in Guatemala and Mexico, with professional drivers and air-conditioned vehicles. Travel worry-free with our service tailored to your schedules and destinations!

esp2.d1: Regular service: Scheduled departures to popular destinations with pre-set times.
esp2.d2: Fixed routes: Established routes that include transfers to your hotel or accommodation.
esp2.d3: Professional driver: Trained personnel for a safe trip.
esp2.d4: Comfortable vehicles: Spacious and well-maintained units.
esp2.d7: Panajachel to Antigua: 5:00 AM, 9:00 AM, 12:00 PM, 4:00 PM
esp2.d8: Antigua to Panajachel: 8:00 AM, 12:30 PM, 4:00 PM
esp2.d9: Panajachel to Guatemala City: 5:00 AM, 9:00 AM, 12:00 AM, 4:00 AM
esp2.d10: Guatemala City to Panajachel: 6:00 AM, 11:00 AM, 2:00 PM
esp2.d11: Antigua to Guatemala City: 4:00 AM, 9:00 AM, 12:30 AM, 6:30 AM
esp2.d12: Panajachel to Chichicastenango (market day) Thursday and Sunday: Departure - 8:00 AM (Q.75.00 p/p) / Return - 2:00 PM (Q.75.00 p/p)
esp2.d14: Panajachel to San Cristobal de las Casas, Mexico DF: 5:00 AM
esp2.d15: Panajachel to Cob√°n: 8:00 AM (direct) / 5:00 AM, 9:00 AM (via Guatemala City)

serviceD.description3: Exclusivity and comfort on every trip. Enjoy a private and personalized transfer.
serviceD.d3: Our private shuttles offer the best experience in exclusive travel. Enjoy a comfortable and secure transfer with personalized attention.

esp3.d1: Exclusive service: Private trip for you and your companions, with the option to return to the departure location regardless of the route.
esp3.d2: Personalized routes: Flexibility in schedule and pickup/drop-off location.
esp3.d3: Professional driver: Trained driver to ensure your safety and comfort.
esp3.d4: Modern and well-equipped vehicles: Recent, comfortable, and safe units with a capacity of up to 13 people.
esp3.d5: Air conditioning: For a fresh and pleasant trip.

serviceD.description4: Discover the beauty of Guatemala with our boat tours. Explore the jungle, discover volcanoes, and live an unforgettable experience.
serviceD.d4: Embark on our public boat tours and explore Guatemala‚Äôs most beautiful corners, surrounded by nature and great company.

esp4.d3: Fixed Departure Times: 8:00 AM or 9:00 AM
esp4.d5: Guide (Optional): Some tours include a guide, others do not.
esp4.d6: 3-Town Tour: Santiago Atitl√°n, San Pedro La Laguna, and San Pedro La Laguna - Departure: 9:00 AM - Return: 3:00 PM

serviceD.description5: Discover the beauty of Guatemala with our private boat tours. Explore the jungle, discover volcanoes, and live an unforgettable experience.
serviceD.d5: Enjoy a private boat tour, where you can explore Guatemala exclusively and personally, tailored to your interests.

esp5.d1: Private Boat: Round trip with all the comfort.
esp5.d2: Flexible Schedule: Choose the starting time (7:00 AM - 5:00 PM). Additional charge for tours outside this schedule.
esp5.d3: Time to Explore: We adapt to your pace.
esp5.d4: Life Jackets: Safety is our priority.
esp5.d5: Great Atmosphere: Music, laughter, and guaranteed fun.
esp5.d6: Seats with Backrest: Relax and enjoy the scenery comfortably.
esp5.d7: Regular Schedule: From 7:00 AM to 5:00 PM.
esp5.d8: 1-Town Tour: Choose one of the 14 towns in Solol√°, and we take you there. Includes round trip. We adapt to your time. Does not include a guide. Departure at any time (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM).
esp5.d9: 3-Town Tour: San Juan la Laguna, Santiago Atitl√°n, and San Pedro La Laguna. Does not include a guide. Departure at any time (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM).
esp5.d10: 3-Town Tour: Santiago Atitl√°n, San Juan la Laguna, and San Juan la Laguna. Departure at any time (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM). Includes a bilingual guide throughout the tour.
esp5.d11: 3-Town Tour: San Lucas Tolim√°n, San Lucas Tolim√°n, and Santiago Atitl√°n. Departure at any time (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM). Includes a bilingual guide throughout the tour.
esp5.d12: Medium Tour: Hot Springs, Hot Springs, and San Antonio Palopo. Departure at any time (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM). Includes a bilingual guide throughout the tour.
esp5.d13: 4-Town Tour: San Marcos la Laguna, San Juan la Laguna, San Juan la Laguna, and San Pedro la Laguna. Departure at any time (7:00 AM to 5:00 PM).

serviceD.description6: Immerse yourself in Mayan culture and discover the traditions of each town.
serviceD.d6: Travel through the towns of Guatemala and connect with Mayan culture, its traditions, and the rich history of each place.

esp6.d1: Adventures: You will have the opportunity to experience unforgettable moments in each town.
esp6.d2: Culture: Discover Mayan culture and its traditional customs.
esp6.d3: Handicrafts: Explore local handicrafts and enjoy handmade products.
esp6.d4: History: Learn about the history of each town and its past.

esp8.d3: Relax in the hot springs (Fuentes Georginas)
esp8.d4: Zunil, Maximon - soul guardian, and more!

esp9.d1: Transportation from your hotel to the public dock.
esp9.d2: Boat from Panajachel to San Pedro and back.

serviceD.description10: Travel comfortably and safely on our buses. Book your tickets now!
serviceD.d10: Our buses offer a comfortable and safe journey, with routes that connect you easily and quickly. Book your ticket and travel with us!
serviceD.description11: Comfortable and safe transportation on every trip, with daily departures.
serviceD.d11: Travel between Guatemala and El Salvador with comfort and safety. Enjoy the scenery while traveling with us every day.

esp11.d2: Executive Class - Departure: 2:00 PM (Double decker with sleeping seats)

serviceD.description12: Come and enjoy bike rides, discovering unforgettable landscapes along the way.
serviceD.d12: Explore Guatemala on two wheels, enjoying breathtaking landscapes while getting some exercise and having a unique experience.
serviceD.description13: Book your domestic and international flights with us and travel worry-free.
serviceD.d13: Reach your destination safely and comfortably, whether within Guatemala or around the world. With our wide range of flights, making your next trip a reality is easier than ever.
serviceD.description14: Embark on a hiking adventure through the stunning landscapes of Guatemala. Explore mountains, forests, and volcanoes while connecting with nature.
serviceD.d14: Experience an unforgettable journey through Guatemala's trails, surrounded by incredible biodiversity and landscapes that will leave you speechless. Nature awaits you!

esp14.d1: San Pedro Volcano Tour: Guide, round-trip boat, breakfast and lunch, park entrance, local transportation in San Pedro to reach the park.
esp14.d2: Nariz del Indio Tour (San Juan La Laguna): Round-trip transportation, guide, entrance, morning coffee or tea.
esp14.d3: Altar Maya Tour (San Jorge and Solol√°): Transportation, guide, entrances, light snack.

serviceD.description15: Embark on an exciting ATV adventure through the breathtaking landscapes of Guatemala. Feel the adrenaline rush as you explore the wildest nature.

esp15.d1: Pro Tour - with guide - Visit 2 towns: Santa Catarina Palop√≥, San Antonio Palop√≥. Includes visits to the Cultural Center, Chocolate Factory, and scenic viewpoints.
esp15.d2: Santa Catarina Palop√≥ Tour - with guide - Visit 1 town: Cultural Center, Boardwalk, Hot Springs.
esp15.d3: Viewpoint Tour - with guide: Main street of Panajachel, Panajachel lakeshore, Scenic Viewpoint.

serviceD.d15: Enjoy an exhilarating ATV experience while exploring Guatemala‚Äôs wild beauty, from volcanoes to jungles.
serviceD.description16: Fly through the treetops and enjoy a unique view of the Guatemalan jungle on our canopy tours. An adventure filled with adrenaline and nature!
serviceD.d16: Enjoy a unique experience soaring above the treetops and discover the majesty of the Guatemalan jungle from an incredible perspective. An adventure that will make you feel on top of the world!

esp16.d1: Ultra Extreme: Includes three of the longest cables per person.
esp16.d2: Extreme: Includes a tour on one extreme cable.
esp16.d3: Schedules: 9:00 AM, 11:00 AM, and 3:00 PM / Includes transportation to the site.

esp17.d1: Flight schedules: Available from 7:00 AM to 4:00 PM.
esp17.d2: Minimum age: 5 years old and up.
esp17.d4: Recommended clothing: Wear sportswear for better comfort.
esp17.d5: Flight duration: Approximately 15 to 30 minutes, subject to weather conditions.
esp17.d6: Includes: An expert guide who will accompany you throughout the flight.
esp17.d7: Safety equipment: All necessary equipment is provided for a safe and exciting experience.
esp17.d8: The price includes transportation from our travel agency in Panajachel to the take-off area.
esp17.d9: Payment must be made in advance to secure your spot.
esp17.d10: Paragliding is considered an extreme sport, and you will be flying at your own risk.
esp17.d11: Discounts available for groups of more than 5 people.

serviceD.description17: Enjoy panoramic views of the lake and volcanoes while paragliding. An irresistible experience!
serviceD.d17: Soar over the lake and volcanoes, enjoying panoramic views that only paragliding can offer. An exciting and irresistible experience!

esp18.d1: Takes place in San Buenaventura Bay.

serviceD.description22: Experience a unique adventure sailing on the breathtaking Lake Atitl√°n. Enjoy spectacular landscapes while engaging in your dream activity on the lake.
serviceD.d22: Sail through the crystal-clear waters of Lake Atitl√°n, enjoying the beauty of its surroundings: volcanoes, indigenous villages, and vibrant nature. A journey filled with history and culture at every turn while you enjoy your event. Important note: Only the boat rental is included, not drinks, food, or decoration. The same tours as in a regular boat can be done, with the advantage that this boat has a much larger capacity.

esp22.d5: üìç Santa Catarina Palop√≥: Cultural Center with exhibitions on the history and traditions of the town. Boardwalk with an impressive view of the lake and volcanoes. Natural hot springs by the lakeshore. Cobblestone streets with murals and houses painted with Mayan designs. Typical handicrafts, especially textiles and decorated ceramics. Painting workshops where locals teach about art.
esp22.d6: üìç San Antonio Palop√≥: Artisan chocolate factory where you can see the process and taste different flavors. Ceramic factory with unique hand-painted pieces. Scenic viewpoints with spectacular views of the lake and volcanoes. Colonial church with simple architecture.

serviceD.description23: Find the perfect home for your stay in Guatemala through Airbnb. Enjoy comfort, privacy, and a unique experience in selected properties in the country's best destinations.
serviceD.d23: Rent unique homes through Airbnb, tailored to your needs, whether near Lake Atitl√°n, the city of Antigua, or other beautiful corners of Guatemala. Live like a local with all the comforts.

esp23.d1: Casa del R√≠o, Panajachel: Capacity for 10 people, includes 3 bedrooms, 4 double beds, 1 sofa bed, living room, equipped kitchen, dining area, balcony, 1 bathroom with bathtub, hot water, cable TV, Wi-Fi, and parking service.
esp23.d2: Bungalows Casa Aine, Panajachel: Capacity for 7 people, includes 2 bedrooms, the first room with 2 double beds and 1 imperial bed, cable TV; the second room includes 1 double bed, cable TV, Wi-Fi, green area, equipped kitchen, and parking service.
esp23.d3: Apartment in Riviera de Atitl√°n: Includes 2 bedrooms for 8 people, kitchen, living room, dining area, Wi-Fi, lake view, private beach, includes heated pool and jacuzzi.
